mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY (REPLY_NUMBER, REVIEW_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, NICKNAME, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{reviewNumber}, #{userNumber}, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}), #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_REPLY WHERE REVIEW_NUMBER = #{reviewNumber}
